duplicate-info: User's data with duplicate language is not allowed
mobile-phone-in-use: Mobile phone is already in use
meta-id: User's meta information Id must be provided in case metadata needs to be changed
only-admin: The only admin claim cannot be removed. It is mandatory that one admin user to be existed for the system to remain functional.
no-avatar: Please select a file as your avar before sending
email-already-verified: The email address has been already verified
mobile-already-verified: The mobile phone number has been already verified
invalid-expired-token: The code is invalid or expired
mobile-is-empty: Mobile phone number has not been entered
phone-verification-code-limit: New code cannot be generated until next {time} seconds
email-verification-code-limit: New verification code cannot be generated until next {time} seconds
account-activation-by-email: Please enter the activation token that has been sent to your email address to activate your user account
current-new-password-same: Your current and new password are identical. Please enter a new password.
